features.featureTitle: Update the centralized services copy in `frontend/src/content/dreamonomyCopy.ts` to remove the current placeholder/generic services content (hero title/subtitle, categories array, and CTA copy) and replace it with only the user-provided “SERVICES / Our Learning Services” content and its full structure: intro paragraph, (1) Core Academic Subjects (Elementary K–10) with subject list + “Our Approach” bullets + closing sentence, (2) Out-of-Syllabus & Interdisciplinary Learning (Our USP) with subject list + “These subjects help children” bullets, (3) Responsible AI Education for Children with 2-line positioning + curriculum focus bullets + outcome line, (4) Subject Journaling & Emotional Tracking with journal tracking bullets + “This allows us to” bullets, and “Personalised Growth & Mentorship Programs” with 3 program items + “We help students” bullets.

Update `frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx` to render the Services page using the new user-provided services structure from `dreamonomyCopy`, replacing the current generic 6-card grid and the generic CTA section. Keep the existing overall styling approach (responsive layout, current background treatment via `DecorativeAccents`, and existing typography/spacing conventions), but ensure the page displays all provided sections and bullet lists clearly and scannably on desktop/tablet/mobile.
